content: The Frustrated User: This archetype represents users who experience frustration when interacting with the Cita Previa website. They may feel overwhelmed or stressed by the process, and may fear missing out on an appointment or losing valuable time. They may also feel lack of feedback or empathy from the website, which contributes to their frustration. This archetype is characterized by quotes such as "The website feels like a scam and not secure at all," "I felt lost at one point," and "I would like to be ensured that they are helping me, some sort of feedback or empathy behind this. A way to reach out for help." These users may be looking for a smoother and more intuitive process that addresses their concerns and meets their needs.
